Summary: Saw the so called Black Triangle tonight!
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Sidney
There were no other sightings in Sidney on or around July 26th 2011
divs: Sighting DetailsThis 21 engine triangle at about 1000 ft altitude or lower with no sound at all. (Not even the sound of cutting air at the speed it was traveling) At the time about 1139PM EASTER STANDARD TIME as it traveled over my house at aprox. 500mph I had 15 seconds of view time and my son had about 8 seconds of view time. We saw the craft so well we could identify a single power source attached to the 3 cylindrical housings containing 7 vents for directional propulsion venting blue flames or blue heat giving the appearance of 3 lights. Possibly a plasma engine? However I have no explination how something of such mass could maintain current speed, altitude and silence.
